plot: She died three years ago, as tradition wants it, we went to dig her bones out to clean them and take them to her native village.
title: La vie sombre trois fois, se relève sept et neuf fois flotte à la dérive...
plot_es: She died three years ago, as tradition wants it, we went to dig her bones out to clean them and take them to her native village.
original_name: La vie sombre trois fois, se relève sept et neuf fois flotte à la dérive...
plot_en: She died three years ago, as tradition wants it, we went to dig her bones out to clean them and take them to her native village.
